articles.title: End Red Tape, Roll Out Red Carpet - Swarajya
articles.description: In the post-pandemic world, being the fastest growing economy is an imminently attainable target for India.
articles.content: When Prime Minister Narendra Modi took office in May 2014, he vowed to end the red tape that for decades had choked Indian business. He pledged to instead roll out the red carpet, attract foreign inv… [+5064 chars]
